import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const BecomeaHost = () => { function sendEmail(e){ e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm( "teenytinyexplorers", "template_kxw5tph", e.target, "user_a5jwzuX6kSAOK7KdHVqVM" ).then(res=>{ console.log(res); }).catch(err=>console.log(err)); } return (

Contact Form

Please indicate your preferred contact method below message
); }; export default BecomeaHost;
